segments.text: You seem to like her very much , don't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't deny that . She is so beautiful that I fell in love with her at the first sight . I wish I knew more about her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I heard that she had a three-year-old girl .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can not belive that . It must be cooked up by someone .
segments.speaker: S2
